Text: (What is this...?)
(My magic... I can't use it?)

Um, taking all of this into account, we of the
student council hope to improve life at...
(Nobody's noticed it yet.)

I practice my control by constantly manipulating
magic particles within my body, but I now find
myself unable to manipulate it at all.

It's as if something is blocking the flow
of magic.

(I can try to force the flow back open, or I can make
the particles even smaller.)

As I'm pondering the issue, I sense multiple
presences approaching the classroom.
(They're here...!)
I thought about saying something, but just then...
There is the sound of a tremendous explosion.
What the?!
Eek!

The door of the room is blown off its hinges, and the
class goes into an uproar. Immediately after, a group
of men in black rush in with their swords drawn.
Nobody move!
The men bark this order and block the exit.

The lead assailant tops this off by swinging
his sword...

and destroying our own weapons which were stowed by
the door.
We are the Shadow Garden!
This academy is ours now!
Stay in your seats. All of you, hands up!
You don't seem to realize what kind of place this is.

A dignified voice rings out. Rose places a hand on
the rapier at her hip and faces down the attackers.

You mean to seize an academy for Dark Knights?
That does not sound like a sane choice to me.
Rose Oriana places herself in front of the men.
I told you to throw down your weapons.
I refuse.
Hmph, I suppose you'll make a good example.
The man in black readies his sword.
Haaah!
Huh?!
What the...?!
A perturbed look appears on Rose's face.
Rose!
My magic!
Heheh...
Looks like you finally noticed...
The man laughs.
But I'm afraid...
that you're much too late!!!
Oh!

You dark knights' swords provide no defense without
magic.
Didn't they teach you that in class?

Rose feels her own death is imminent as the naked
blade bears down on her.

With her frail body unable to wield magic, neither
blocking nor evading would be enough to save her.

She can try to twist her torso away to lessen the
damage, but even that movement would be slow
and dull.

It won't be quick enough. Thinking realistically,
death looms before her.
Suddenly, a piercing yell fills the air.
Stooooooop!!!
Huh?!
Something throws itself into Rose from the side.
Wha...
A body falls to the floor.
And a stunning sight unfolds before Rose's eyes.
There lay the limp, bloody body of a boy.

The pool of blood on the floor grows as she watches
in horror.
It is a fatal wound.
